data.name: 鉄之海老 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Kick out the mooks with the anti-aircraft machine gun.
Use the anti-aircraft machine gun to kick out the mooks,
use the main gun to destroy the boss,
and survive the onslaught of the enemy!
This is a trial version of the top view tank game "Tetsuno Ebi",
which You can play up to BOSS4 now!
We are planning to release it officially in 2022.
※This game is created with Pixel Game Maker MV

data.short_description: Kick out the mooks with the anti-aircraft machine gun. Use the anti-aircraft machine gun to kick out the mooks, use the main gun to destroy the boss, and survive the onslaught of the enemy! This is a trial version of the top view tank game "Tetsuno Ebi", which You can play up to BOSS4 now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
